title: Multi-Lattice Sampling of Quantum Field Theories via Neural Operator-based Flows. (arXiv:2401.00828v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: We consider the problem of sampling discrete field configurations $\phi$ from the Boltzmann distribution $[d\phi] Z^{-1} e^{-S[\phi]}$, where $S$ is the lattice-discretization of the continuous Euclidean action $\mathcal S$ of some quantum field theory. Since such densities arise as the approximation of the underlying functional density $[\mathcal D\phi(x)] \mathcal Z^{-1} e^{-\mathcal S[\phi(x)]}$, we frame the task as an instance of operator learning. translated_title: 基于神经算子流的量子场论多格采样方法
translated_abstract: 本文考虑从玻尔兹曼分布中采样离散场配置$\phi$的问题，其中$S$是某个量子场论连续欧几里得作用$\mathcal S$的格点离散化。我们将该密度近似视为底层函数密度$[\mathcal D\phi(x)]\mathcal Z^{-1}e^{-\mathcal S[\phi(x)]}$的学习算子实例。具体而言，我们提出了近似时间相关算子$\mathcal V_t$的方法，其时间积分提供了自由理论$[\mathcal D\phi(x)]\mathcal Z_0^{-1}e^{-\mathcal S_{0}[\phi(x)]}$的函数分布与目标理论$[\mathcal D\phi(x)]\mathcal Z^{-1}e^{-\mathcal S[\phi(x)]}$之间的映射。当选择特定的格点时，算子$\mathcal V_t$可以离散化为有限维的时间相关矢量场$V_t$，从而在离散格点上实现了连续的归一化流。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于神经算子流的方法，通过近似时间相关算子，实现了在量子场论中从底层自由理论到目标理论的离散-连续归一化流。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a method based on neural operator flows to approximate the time-dependent operator, which enables a continuous normalizing flow from the underlying free theory to the target theory in quantum field theories.
